news.content: New: This banner and PR/issues details are now available!
You can now authenticate with your own GitHub token! Check the settings in the top-right corner of the page.
Manual token authentication is no more: you can now use the new, shiny "Login with GitHub" button!
New! Improved engine brings support for svelte-preprocess, rollup-plugin-svelte and prettier-plugin-svelte
Svelte Changelog v2 is here. [Read the announcement](/devlog/v2).
The details page can now display the full file diffs! Visit a PR details and expand the 'Files' dropdown to see that in action
